Field Summary
private  int coreId
          Which core is being measured.
private  long guest
          Which is time spent running a virtual CPU for guest operating systems under the control of the linux kernel.
private  long idle
          Idle task.
private  long iowait
          I/O wait - time waiting for I/O to complete.
private  long irq
          Time servicing interrupts.
private  int load
          The CPU usage load in the last gathered interval
private  long nice
          User mode with low priority.
private static long serialVersionUID
           
private  int softirq
          Time serving softirqs.
private  long steal
          Stolen time, which is the time spent in other operating systems when running in a virtualized environment.
private  long sysmode
          System mode.
private  long user
          User mode.
